inputs.label: use_context
inputs.description: When true, include this run's active context messages (context.messages) as agent history. If the pin is not connected, the node checkbox is used. Default: false.

inputs.label: provider
inputs.description: LLM provider id (e.g. LMStudio). If unset, uses the node’s configured provider.

inputs.label: model
inputs.description: LLM model id/name. If unset, uses the node’s configured model.

inputs.label: temperature
inputs.description: Sampling temperature (0 = deterministic). If unset, uses the node’s configured temperature.

inputs.label: seed
inputs.description: Seed for deterministic sampling (-1 = random/unset). If unset, uses the node’s configured seed.

inputs.label: max_iterations
inputs.description: Maximum internal ReAct iterations (safety cap). Higher values allow more tool-use steps.

inputs.label: max_input_tokens
inputs.description: Optional per-agent input token budget (max_input_tokens). When set, overrides the run's default _limits.max_input_tokens for the agent sub-run.

inputs.label: system
inputs.description: Optional system prompt for this agent instance (high priority instructions).

inputs.label: prompt
inputs.description: The task/user prompt for the agent to solve.

inputs.label: tools
inputs.description: Allowlist of tool names this agent can call (defense-in-depth; runtime still enforces allowlists).

inputs.label: structured_output
inputs.description: Optional JSON Schema object (type=object) the final answer must conform to.

inputs.label: context
inputs.description: Optional explicit context object for the agent (e.g. {messages:[...]}). If provided, it can override inherited run context.

outputs.label: response
outputs.description: Best-effort final answer string (convenience pin). In structured-output mode, this reflects the unstructured answer prior to the schema post-pass.

outputs.label: meta
outputs.description: Host-facing meta envelope (schema=abstractcode.agent.v1.meta). Includes provider/model and lightweight execution metadata.

outputs.label: scratchpad
outputs.description: Runtime-owned execution trace/scratchpad for observability (LLM/tool steps, timings). Includes best-effort tool_calls/tool_results extracted post-run.

outputs.label: result
outputs.description: Structured final agent result (answer or structured output object).
